house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1983 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Century 21 Distinguished Prope Century 21 Distinguished Prope
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Pantry
